thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Srinivasan Venkatesh
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Srinivasan Venkatesh

author: Srinivasan Venkatesh
title: Srinivasan Venkatesh
text:
Right at the start of the "Essential Malaysia" trip booking process, there was an unnecessary argument about a "free Hotel night" that was clearly advertised on the Goway website but nor offerred by the booking agent. However, this was soon rectified. The rest of the trip process and all related arrangements - the quality of the hotels, the places covered, were all excellent. The one complaint was that the tour van did not have reclining seats and this made sitting for long periods very uncomfortable.
Overall the tour arrangements, from start to finish, were excellent and professional.
